name: Crescite
description:
Welcome to the exciting world of Cropout, a casual top-down strategy game! Create your own farm, grow crops, collect resources, and prosper.
Cropout invites you to a farm with unique stylized graphics and an intuitive interface. The game starts with a randomly generated island with rocks, trees, and fruit plants that you can use to develop your farm. Use the materials wisely, build residential blocks for your workers, optimize the space, and do not forget to keep track of the amount of food. Food is a key resource, and if the reserves run out, the game will be lost.
